p: In the event of a viral infection, and particularly when the infection has pandemic potential, identifying the source of infection is decisive in controlling its spread [ 9]. To date, genome sequence analyses were performed and the first results confirmed the membership of SARS-CoV-2 to the family Coronaviridae, genus Betacoronavirus, and subgenus Sarbecovirus (which also includes SARS-CoV) [ 10], and granted the development of real time (RT)-PCR (polymerase chain reaction) diagnostic tests used for SARS-CoV-2 identification [ 11].
